glsa.title: evilvte: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code
glsa.synopsis: Improper hypertext validation might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: VTE based, highly customizable terminal emulator

description.p: Steve Kemp of Debian identified a flaw in evilvte which does not properly validate hypertext links. Please review the Debian bug report referenced below.

impact.p: Remote attackers could execute arbitrary code by enticing a user to click a hyperlink in their terminal.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: Gentoo Security recommends that users unmerge evilvte:
